name: PATTERNPLAY LIGHT SHADE White
description:
XMAS SPECIAL > 
Orders placed in December will be shipped free within Australia! 

PRODUCT DESCRIPTION > 
The hand-knotted craftsmanship of this macrame piece is finished to modern perfection with copper hardware and will throw an incredible shadow of pattern on your walls when lit. Made from synthetic cord on a steel frame it measures approximately 55cm high x 32cm diameter.

PLEASE NOTE >
Patternplay must be hung from an electrical fitting that is able to support 2kg. Fitting is not included.

POSTAGE >
This item is made to order and will require 21 business days for production prior to shipping via Australia Post's Registered Post service. 

SUBSCRIPTION > All purchasing customers of my shop are automatically subscribed to my mailing list though it's super easy to unsubscribe if you're not interested.

Patternplay Copyright © Tamara Maynes 2013

name: Dargans Rides Again
description:
XMAS SHIPPING - This item is currently in stock. Orders placed in December are shipped free within Australia!

PRODUCT DESCRIPTION > 
Vintage horseshoes collected from farriers in country NSW are dipped in pale gold glitter and lacquered. Each is unique and slightly different in shape and size measuring between 11-14cm diameter.

POSTAGE >
This item ships within 3 business days via Australia Post registered post.

SUBSCRIPTION > All purchasing customers of my store are automatically subscribed to my mailing list though it's super easy to unsubscribe if you're not interested.

Dargans Rides Again Copyright © Tamara Maynes 2013

name: It's Beautiful Here
description:
XMAS SHIPPING - This item is currently in stock. Orders placed in December are shipped free within Australia!

PRODUCT DESCRIPTION > 
This item is handcrafted from thick wire and powder coated in a putty/white. Looks incredible on any colour wall but sits perfectly on a plain white wall. It is approximately 25cm high between it's highest points and approximately 90cm long.

POSTAGE >
This item will be shipped within 3 business days via Australia Post's Registered Post service. At present this item is only shipped within Australia. Please email me to enquire about posting to international destinations prior to purchasing. 

SUBSCRIPTION > All purchasing customers of my shop are automatically subscribed to my mailing list though it's super easy to unsubscribe if you're not interested.

Copyright © Tamara Maynes 2009

name: DIY Quilt Light Template & Instructions Download
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION > 
Download the template, print it onto plain paper and use it to make one or more Quilt Lights, in any size from any suitable material, decorated as you wish. Downloadable PDF includes template and ten step instructions. The finished Quilt Light's shown here are made of heavy weight painted box board and light box board joined and decorated with Washi/MT tape.

PRODUCT DELIVERY >
This item is a printable download only and does not come as a finished product. You will receive the link to download within minutes of purchasing. Please ensure the email address you state during checkout is correct.

PLEASE NOTE > 
The Quilt Light template and instructions are sold strictly for personal use and are not permitted to be used for commercial purposes. 

SUBSCRIPTION > 
Customers of my shop are automatically subscribed to our mailing list to be sporadically updated on new products and events. If you wish to unsubscribe at any time it's super easy to do so.

Copyright © Tamara Maynes 2011

name: WALL FLOWER Vertical Garden
description:
XMAS SPECIAL > Orders placed in December will be shipped free within Australia!

PRODUCT DESCRIPTION > 
The hand-knotted craftsmanship of this macrame piece is finished to modern perfection with copper hardware. Made from synthetic cord and hung on a polished copper rod, Wall Flower measures approximately 41cm wide x 81cm long. A collaboration with Sarah K, co-founder of Supercyclers, this piece comes complete with recycled plastic straw vases to hold flora.

POSTAGE >
This item is made to order and will require 21 business days for production prior to shipping via Australia Post's Registered Post service.

name: Modern Macrame Workshops
description:
WORKSHOP DESCRIPTION > 
One of my earliest memories is of playing with macramé bits at my mothers craft supplies store in the 70’s. Come along and learn the basics of macramé with me, the craft designer who made macrame cool again with my range of modern macrame owls titled 'To John Denver With Love'. During this 4hr workshop you will master basic knots, work them into your own modern plant hanger complete with my trademark copper hardware, cascading greenery and leave with enough knowledge and inspiration to delve into other modern macramé projects!

WORKSHOP DETAILS >
2014 dates and times to be announced
@ The School 85 Dunning Avenue Rosebery 

BOOKING DETAILS >
Places for this workshop are to be booked exclusively through The School. Do not book here, instead please visit www.theschool.com.au 

Copyright © Tamara Maynes 2012

options.name: DO NOT BOOK HERE, SEE THESCHOOL.COM.AU

Originally requested for a shoot with Australian uber stylist Megan Morton these wire wall hands are crafted from thick wire. Sprayed in four colours they are approximately the same size as an average hand.

name: Wooden Dolls by Sarah K
description:
NEWS!!!
In a couple of weeks we are closing our doors to make way for an exciting successor! Please place orders promptly to avoid missing out on this product. Also a good idea to subscribe so we can take you on our next adventure!

PRODUCT DESCRIPTION > 
Designed and handcrafted by Australia's prolific Sarah K of Supercylers fame these wooden dolls are sold separately. Inspired by mid century designers dolls these modern versions are made from timber offcuts with a combination of painted and decal details. Doll heights vary between 13.5-20cm. Main image shows doll A-E from left to right. If you are interested in purchasing the full set please email me to enquire about price and postage.

POSTAGE >
This item requires 14 business days for production prior to being shipped via Australia Post's Registered Post service. Apologies but at present this item is only shipped within Australia. Please email me to enquire about posting to international destinations prior to purchasing.

PLEASE NOTE > 
This material and finished product is hand crafted, with imperfections celebrated as part of its nature. We recommend you read our STORE POLICIES page before making your purchase.

SUBSCRIPTION > All purchasing customers of The Six Week Boutique are automatically subscribed to my mailing list though it's super easy to unsubscribe if you're not interested.

Copyright © Sarah King 2012
